snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes the 15 finalists in the Google Science Fair, an appeal against posting on Twitter during presentations and a...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes the 15 finalists in the Google Science Fair, an appeal against posting on Twitter during presentations and a sendup of tech start-up explanatory videos.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Zuckerberg Photos and 'Mister Rogers'
